categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: A Trade Federation gunship was a class of starship used by the Trade Federation around 32 BBY. One of the vessels appeared at the end of a mission to Obredaan, suggesting to the Jedi Order a link between the Trade Federation and the Jin'ha warriors. The class was also used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. Several were present on Vjun in 19 BBY.
Trade Federation gunships first appeared in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Obi-Wan. They also appeared later in 2004 in the novel Yoda: Dark Rendezvous, written by Sean Stewart.
